data.title: SGI
data.meta_description: SGI company, support, and contact information. Page includes SGI's phone number, address, e-mail, and related pages.
data.text:
Founded in 1982 by Dr. James Clark and seven co-founders, SGI provides a broad range of high-performance computing and advanced graphic solutions. Its services enable customers to understand and conquer their toughest computing problems.

On November 1, 2016, HPE (Hewlett Packard Enterprise) announced that it has completed its acquisition of SGI.

Contact information

Contact HPE for support.

Companies selling similar products

Computer manufacturers

OpenGL

Company news

November 1, 2016 - HPE (Hewlett Packard Enterprise) announced it had completed its acquisition of SGI.

March 2000 - The Cray research business unit created in August 1999 was sold to Tera Computer company.

August 1999 - SGI created a separate Cray research business unit to focus on the unique requirements of high-end supercomputing customers.

February 1996 - Cray Research merged with SGI
